title: My LoL crashes every time after I select a champ and tells me to reconnect, but i cant?
body: 1. * Im really getting tilted and I need help please, nothing I do is fixing it, rito please

replies.body: It sounds like your network is losing connection to the server and kicking you out of champion select.  As Rineyy suggested, I recommend going over our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection.  It's especially important that this is resolved asap, in case you lose sync in champion select and a game starts without you!  This should get you fixed up, but let me know!

This likely stems from an unstable connection to the servers. [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
